body: @WHO KNOWS LMAO kazuya is not a simp, he's a disappointment, he would disgrace the sanctity of us simps, he barely deserve the lowest rank among us, so don't compare us simps to him, true simps are true men with balls and can apply it in real life😒

@Typical japanese MainCharacter  Don't assume every weeb is like that, bro.  I, for one, IMMENSELY enjoy a good Kirito cucking, and I know many others who feel the same.
as a vanilla fag i condone this lul

4/10 Story | 8/10 Art | 2/10 Character | 3/10 Enjoyment | 4,2/10 Overall | Well there are barely any text in here, so that means there are barely a story and a character development. The art is nice but not the best. Also i didn't even move my hand to fap to this, so no enjoyment either.

Like the mc from AoT, in the anime, he didn't get the fair skinned, yellow hair with blue eyes royal girl and he didn't get the buff android-like sperg japgirl either, therefore, despite how much they hyped the character, in the end, he died without getting his dik wet, and that equals being  loser character. You'll see people who fanboy'd/fangirl'd so hard for him before his demise suddenly calling him a cuck. In the past, anime characters were allowed to lose/not get all the pussy, even manga/"light novel" power fantasy wish fulfilling mcs on rare occasions. But now days? Or rather since mid 2000's, authors/publishers seem terrified and shy at the idea, the simple notion of their precious self insert not having the world handed down to them through sheer asspulls and plot conveniences that would spin the mcs occasional loses into major wins, because that's what makes the target demographic feel good, get those warm n fuzzy feelings around their genitals. What sells.

From what I understand of this show, it's the typical run of the mil japsuke mc in a typical harem romcom but without the mc being as much of a convenient special snowflake such as being rich, having powers, girl magnet "because...", descendant of a special snowflake or ace student. There are no "alien/foreign - royal/rich girl just so happens to cross eyes with which just happens to be a jap / fell from [somewhere/something] right onto japsuke no mc's lap who proceeded to [IT'S A MISUNDERSTANDING!]-style grope her, making her get tsundere about it" plot/narrative, the author has poured more of his own flaws onto his self-insert then what japotaku authors usually do and people seem confused at how the japmc isn't insta-winning everything/everyone in his world. You people have been conditioned to despise any mc that isn't a shameless idealized gary-stu "win-it-all" who has at least 2 - 4 humid pussies on quick dial disposition. If he isn't "in-the-zone" within 3 episodes, he's thrash.
I don't get why he gets alot of hate..
